title: Development
description: I am a software developer with a passion for building beautiful, responsive websites and mobile applications. I have a background in both front-end and back-end development, and I am currently working on a full-stack software developer.

title: Design
description: I value simple content structure, clean design patterns, and thoughtful interactions. I alway try to be as carefully to details as possible. A good UX is really important to me and I try to make sure that my products are as user friendly as possible.

tools: UX, UI, Web, Mobile, Apps, Games

title: Tools
description: It is basically imposable do create something jut on paper so there are some tools that are helping me designing and program. I learned that the right tool could really save you time and money.
